smartgov.core.agent.moving.plan

Class Plan

  • java.lang.Object
    • smartgov.core.agent.moving.plan.Plan

  • public class Plan
extends java.lang.Object
    A Plan represents a path that an agent wants to follow in the environment graph.

    • Constructor Summary

      Plan constructor.

      Construct a Plan and update it with the provided nodes.

    • Method Detail

      • getCurrentArc

        public Arc getCurrentArc()
        Current arc.
        Returns:
        current arc of this plan

      • update

        public void update(java.util.List<? extends Node> nodes)
        Re-initialize the plan with the provided nodes.

        Clear the previous state, even if the plan was not complete, add all the provided nodes to the plan, and reach the first node of the plan.

        Parameters:
        nodes - new nodes of the plan

      • isPlanComplete

        public boolean isPlanComplete()

      • getNextNode

        public Node getNextNode()
        Next node of this plan. Correspond to the node right after the current node.
        Returns:
        the next node of this plan

      • getLastNode

        public Node getLastNode()
        Last node of this plan. Should correspond to the destination of the corresponding agent.
        Returns:
        last node of this plan

      • getCurrentNode

        Current node of this plan.
        Returns:

      • getNodes

        public java.util.List<Node> getNodes()

        Returns:
        list of nodes of this plan

      • reachNextNode

        public void reachNextNode()
        Reach the next node of the plan, if it exists.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the plan is already complete
